thelastpromise
Class Unit

java.lang.Object
  thelastpromise.Object
      thelastpromise.Unit
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttackUnit, Building, SupportUnit
public class Unit
extends Object

This Unit class extends the Object and presents the different components of the game, such as health, actionpoints, maxactionpoints etc.
